chapter.title: Authors
chapter.p: The first version of Carrot was originally written by Dawid Weiss. It has evolved from a pretty closed search results clustering system into an open, modular framework for pipelined data processing. These changes were significant enough to justify the change of project's name to . Currently the core development is performed by Dawid Weiss and Stanisław Osiński, although many other contributions have been added to the project (thanks!).

chapter.title: OpenSource projects acknowledgement
chapter.p: Carrot is mainly written in Java programming language, because of it's great flexibility and numerous supporting technologies. Carrot also uses several open source projects -- we would like to thank all the contributors and supporters of free and open source software.
